data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 2, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Coritiba to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 8, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Keno (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Coritiba.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Coritiba.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro surge into the attack at Estadio Couto Pereira but Kenoâ€™s header is off-target.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba's Robson breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 23, Great shot from Atletico Mineiro's Guga but he is denied by the crossbar.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Coritiba.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Jefferson Savarino fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 29, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Coritiba.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
In the minute 31, Atletico Mineiro push forward at Estadio Couto Pereira and Keno gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Coritiba defence.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Igor Rabello (Atletico Mineiro) has hit the post with a header.
In the minute 33, Goal! Eduardo Sasha gives Atletico Mineiro a 0-1 lead.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 37, At Estadio Couto Pereira, Jair has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 41, Alan Franco (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 42, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 45, Diego Pombo Lopez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Jair's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 46, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team replace Matheus Galdezani with Igor Jesus.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In Curitiba, Igor Jesus (Coritiba) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 48, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In Curitiba Atletico Mineiro attack through Hyoran. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, Diego Pombo Lopez awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Coritiba's area.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Atletico Mineiro are whistled for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Curitiba.
In the minute 55, Robson (Coritiba) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Sassa (Coritiba) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Keno gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
In the minute 56, Diego Pombo Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
Hugo Moura is replacing Giovanni Augusto for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 57, Atletico Mineiro's Keno attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Guilherme Arana is on a sub for Hyoran for Atletico Mineiro.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 59, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno misses with an attempt on goal.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 60, In Curitiba, Sassa of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Coritiba's Hugo Moura gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 68, Sassa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Coritiba.
Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 69, In Curitiba, Hugo Moura of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Marquinhos is replacing Keno for the away team.
In the minute 71, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Robson for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 75, Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino has run offside.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Junior Alonso has been booked in Curitiba.
Diego Pombo Lopez waits before resuming play because Igor Jesus for Coritiba is still down.
In the minute 81, Diego Pombo Lopez awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Igor Jesus is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Matheus Bueno with Giovanni. This is the third substitution made today by Jorginho.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Free kick Coritiba.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jefferson Savarino is booked for the away team.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Coritiba throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 88, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorginho is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Natanael replacing Jonathan.
Atletico Mineiro make their third substitution with Bueno replacing Alan Franco.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a fourth substitution, with Marrony replacing Eduardo Sasha.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Coritiba push forward at Estadio Couto Pereira and Giovanni gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atletico Mineiro defence.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Robson (Coritiba) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Coritiba pushes forward through Giovanni, whose finish on goal is saved.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Sassa (Coritiba) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Couto Pereira.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Robson for Coritiba has been booked by Diego Pombo Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
